sample

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Block

  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for the creation of a Block. Each block is assigned a particular weight randomly. A Block reduced the Snakes points by how much ever weight is assigned to it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block(Start s)
      This is the default (non-parameterized constructor of the Block.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block(Start s)
        This is the default (non-parameterized constructor of the Block. Each block is a square of side 96 and is placed in a Stack Pane of side 100. The weight of the block is written inside its body.
        Parameters:
        s - It is an instance of the Start Screen of the Game. It is required mainly to show the Collision process.

    • Method Detail

      • getRect

        public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getRect()
        Returns:
        It returns the Rectangle used in the creation of the block.

      • getSPane

        public javafx.scene.layout.StackPane getSPane()
        Returns:
        It returns the Pane used in the creation of the block.

      • getWeight

        public int getWeight()
        Returns:
        It returns the weight of the block.

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(int newWeightt)
        This method sets the weight of the Block and also assigns a Colour to it Randomly. It makes sure that the weight of the Block is within certain bounds.
        Parameters:
        newWeightt - The value of the weight of the Block.

      • getLayoutX

        public double getLayoutX()
        Returns:
        It returns the X Coordinate of the block.

      • getLayoutY

        public double getLayoutY()
        Returns:
        It returns the Y Coordinate of the block.

      • setLayoutX

        public void setLayoutX(double x)
        Parameters:
        x - It is the value of the X Coordinate of the Block.

      • setLayoutY

        public void setLayoutY(double y)
        Parameters:
        y - It is the value of the Y Coordinate of the Block.

      • isColliding

        public void isColliding(Snake snake)
        This method is used to check whether the Block collides with the snake or not. It checks the difference in the X Coordinates of both the Snake and the Block. Based on that it determines whether collision takes place or not. If Collision takes place the Block reduces the size of the snake with the weight assigned to it. If the weight of the block is higher than the snake's weight then the snake dies.
        Parameters:
        snake - It is the Main Snake of the Game.
